entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:08 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 12:08 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:08 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
